attributes.description:
At WINGFIELD MOTORS our customer is king!
Before delivery, this vehicle will receive a Multi-point quality inspection before being subjected to an AA DEKRA roadworthiness test.  We will trade in any vehicle on this transaction and ensure you receive a pleasant buying experience.  Finance and Insurance can be arranged from our premises by our highly qualified and experienced staff.  You can be assured of great aftersales service, should this be required.  This vehicle can be delivered country wide at an agreed cost.  Please ask about our optional Mechanical breakdown warranties for your new vehicle.  We also provide optional Service Plans to ensure you do not experience sudden servicing costs.

attributes.description:
Finding a high quality, reliable pre-owned vehicle can be complicated. That’s why Kia Northcliff offers a straightforward, risk-free solution to purchasing your next pre-owned vehicle. We take pride in the quality of our pre-owned vehicles by thoroughly inspecting and ensuring their roadworthiness, authenticating service history, and verifying mileages.

Kia Konfidence is backed by Kia Motors South Africa, and supported by a nationwide dealer network that ensures excellent trade-in evaluations and nation-wide delivery.

You can also choose from a wide range of vehicle finance options through Kia Financial Services. Add to this a premium customer experience, and you are guaranteed many happy kilometers for years to come. Flexible finance option to suit any budget engage with our experienced trustworthy team today.

attributes.description:
At Kia Northcliff, we pride ourselves on delivering high quality pre-owned vehicles. All our vehicles undergo a full Dekra condition report and roadworthy certificate as well a 125-point quality check, valet. Certified Kia Konfidence Vehicles. All trade ins Welcome. 

The one thing we pride ourselves in more than anything is EXCELLENT CUSTOMER SERVICE. When buying a vehicle from us, you join the Kia Northcliff Family and family look after each other. We will structure a package that will not only suit your needs but your pocket too.    

 Finance can be arranged through all major financial institutions, nationwide delivery available and all trade-in's accepted subject to view. Price excludes on the road fees.
